casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin FRANKLIN. No. 146P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2004 by Defendant for Arrest of Judgment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of April 2004."
